error.message: Call to deprecated method applyDisplayCachablityMetadata() of class Drupal\views\Plugin\views\display\DisplayPluginBase. Deprecated in drupal:8.4.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use DisplayPluginBase::applyDisplayCacheabilityMetadata instead.
Add core_version_requirement: ^8 || ^9 to rest_export_nested.info.yml to designate that the module is compatible with Drupal 9. See https://www.drupal.org/node/3070687.
